thread.title: Downgraded Kushner aims to smooth U.S.-Mexico ties

title: Downgraded Kushner aims to smooth U.S.-Mexico ties
text:
Downgraded Kushner aims to smooth U.S.-Mexico ties Thursday, March 08, 2018 - 02:02 
Senior White House advisor Jared Kushner began a visit to Mexico on Wednesday to try to fix rifts over trade, drugs and immigration but many in the host nation were skeptical he could ease tensions between the two neighboring countries.   
Senior White House advisor Jared Kushner began a visit to Mexico on Wednesday to try to fix rifts over trade, drugs and immigration but many in the host nation were skeptical he could ease tensions between the two neighboring countries.  //reut.rs/2IdBh6O
